message_ENG.text:
:cold_sweat: This referral code was not found.
:heart: Repeat later, or contact support!

:anger: We couldn't find you in the system.
 Please register on the website, or register here.

Welcome to the platform!
 Click on the button ':white_check_mark: Confirm' to confirm your account

:boom: You have successfully registered!
 Click on the ':metal: Menu' button to get a list of features. Also click on the ':love_letter: Help' button to find out the full list of features!
